description: Local Vector Store with search capabilities

persist_directory.info: Custom base directory to save the vector store. Collections will be stored under '{directory}/vector_stores/{collection_name}'. If not specified, it will use your system's cache folder.

existing_collections.info: Select a previously created collection to search through its stored data.

allow_duplicates.info: If false, will not add documents that are already in the Vector Store.

ingest_data.info: Data to store. It will be embedded and indexed for semantic search.

search_query.info: Enter text to search for similar content in the selected collection.

limit.info: Limit the number of records to compare when Allow Duplicates is False.
